How to Play
Get into two teams with the same number of people in a team
If there is an odd person out,pair them with someone else and count them as one person. 
Sit in a circle with no one from the same team sitting by their own team.
Click the play button and the round will begin immediately
Anyone can start with the phone. Their job is to have their teammates guess which word is displayed.
The person describing the word can say anything besides a word that is part of the word or something that rhymes with the word.
When their team guesses the word they pass the phone to the right.
Then the other team does the same. This continues until the time runs out.
A message will appear onscreen to say when the time is up.
Whichever team does not have the phone in their hands at this time gets a point.
The settings can be adjusted so people can play first team to 2 through 10 points.
